name: munki munki baby
description:
I collected these wonderful Heather Ross (designed for Munki Munki) prints for many years and couldn't resist the thought of seeing them all together in one quilt. The wide strips in this design show off great snippets of these fabulous prints and your little one will no doubt have fun playing I Spy and pointing out all the fun little designs - chickens, martians, ice cream trucks, pears and apples... I expect you'll find something new to smile at each time you look at this quilt!  

It's backed with a great strawberry print from Heather Ross's most recent line, Briar Rose. I've used a low loft cotton batting, which leaves it quite soft and drapey. The binding ties it all together with a great solid pink - it was machine sewn to the front and handsewn to the backing for a nice invisible finish.

It's quilted by machine with narrow straight lines which gives great texture, yet keeps this quilt nice and soft.

It's been machine washed and dried and measures about 40" x 46".

This quilt is available to ship as of December 10th.

name: warm hearts #2
description:
This wall hanging features some great hand printed fabrics from one of my favorite companies, Umbrella Prints. They're based in Australia, and hand print these lovely and unique prints. One of my favorites is their heart print, which I have used as the center of this quilt. I paired this print with several other warm solids as well as just a few little extra snippets of Umbrella Prints fabrics. 

I've quilted it by machine in a dense spiral circle, with the center starting right over the heart print. The backing is a one of the darker peach solids, and includes two sewn in corner hanging pockets. 

It measures about 21" x 22", and will arrive unwashed.

name: peachy baby quilt
description:
I pulled together a fun selection of prints in peaches, spring greens and some yellow and gold for this cute baby quilt. There are some great older Heather Ross prints and your little one will no doubt have fun pointing out the tadpoles, dancing frogs and rabbits. 

It's backed with some super soft solids and a few of the prints from the front. I've used a low loft cotton batting, which leaves it quite soft and drapey. 

It's quilted by machine in a free motion starburst pattern. I'm offering this quilt at a discount due to the fact that this is the first time I've used this design, and as such I notice the wobbly lines and uneven stitch length in places. This does not affect the function of the quilt in any way. 

It's been machine washed and dried and measures about 37" x 44".

name: a black and white wall hanging
description:
These great black and white prints are from Lotta Jansdotter's upcoming new line, Sylvia. I used my original Converging Corners design to highlight the fun prints, turning it into a great piece of art for the walls! 

I've quilted it by machine, with a starburst-type pattern in the gray open spaces, along with a diamond shape through the printed portion. 

The backing features a great print in black and white from Violet Craft's latest line, Waterfront Park, and it's bound with a dark gray solid. 

This quilt measures about 24" square and has two corner hanging pockets. It is unwashed. 

I think it would make a great wall hanging, or even a fun centerpiece for a table.

name: Converging Corners
description: This quilt features an original design, all made up out of Denyse Schmidt's popular Flea Market Fancy line (both original and legacy prints). I've quilted it by machine with both some straight lines along with a fun free motion quilted floral motif through the printed portions. It's bound in white and the backing is a pretty aqua with a strip of Flea Market Fancy prints. The binding has been hand sewn to the back for an invisible finish. It's been washed and dried and it measures about 43" square. It's ready to be used, and would make a perfect playmat, lap quilt, or even fun modern wall hanging. You can read more about this quilt here. This quilt is available to ship as of December 10th.

name: Stacked Seating baby quilt
description:
Another original design, my stacked seating pattern. I've made this great baby quilt out of one of Laurie Wisbrun's early lines for Robert Kaufman. This quilt features the reds and oranges from this line, and I've added in a number of coordinating solids in orange, yellow and brown. 

The backing is primarily white with a fun strip of the prints along one side. It's been bound in a nice dark brown to frame it all. 

I've machine quilted this one with a free motion meandering pattern. This great baby quilt measures approximately 43" x 55". It would make a perfect baby gift for a new little boy, or even a nice sized throw for an older child! 

(the third photo shows this quilt in two colorways - please note that this listing is for the red/orange/brown version only)

This quilt is available to ship as of December 10th.

name: Ruby Strings lap quilt
description:
This is my original version of a string quilt, using Bonnie & Camille's popular Ruby fabric line. The gorgeous aquas, reds, greens and grays make for a lovely Christmas quilt, or a quilt for year round use! 

The backing uses one of the prints from this line, bordered on either side with a white solid and the binding is a tiny green polka dot to tie it all together. 

I've machine quilted this one with a free motion meandering/loopy design, which gives the quilt lots of texture. 

This generous lap quilt/throw measures approximately 59" x 68". 

This quilt is available to ship as of December 10th.

name: Scrappy nautical flags baby quilt
description:
This quilt is another original design. I've used a huge variety of fabrics to piece these fun scrappy triangles and set them all in a sea of white. I love this cheerful nautical look!

The backing is a solid piece of one of my favorite prints from Denyse Schmidt's original Flea Market Fancy line. 

I've used a low loft cotton batting and have machine quilted it with lots of narrow straight lines. It's resulted in a lovely lightweight quilt with tons of texture, but still lots of softness and drape. 

Binding is a nice navy herringbone, which has been machine sewn to the front and hand stitched to the backing for an invisible finish. 

This quilt measures 42" x 45", making it the perfect size for a baby quilt for either a boy or girl, or even a small lap quilt. 

This quilt is available to ship as of December 10th.

name: Strawberries & Champagne baby quilt
description:
This sweet quilt uses many pink fabrics in a variety of prints and solids. I added in a bit of gold and brown to add a touch of sophistication. Each of the blocks in this quilt are totally unique, and are made in an improv style, creating a quilt with a lot of visual interest.

For the backing, I used a medium pink solid and added in a patchwork strip of smaller improv blocks. It's been machine quilted by me in a nice all over random meandering pattern. I used a pale pink silk finish thread. It's bound in a solid brown. The binding has been machine sewn to the front, and hand sewn to the backing for a nice invisible finish.

This quilt has been washed in a mild, environmentally friendly detergent and is soft and crinkly and just ready to be snuggled under! Measures about 44" x 53".

This quilt is available to ship as of December 10th.
